item.title: Using Ceph with Proxmox
item.author: yanboyang713@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Boyang Yan
item.description: Objective This guide explains how to set up the Cloud Disk Array on Proxmox. Requirements Fist of all, you need your Cloud Disk Array up and ready. Make sure you have: created a cluster pool for storing data created a Ceph user that Proxmox will use to access the CDA cluster configured permissions for this user and pool (allow read and write) configured your IP access control list to allow Proxmox nodes to access the CDA
